TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_simpi_kapah_katinengan_a_izaw_ku_mahicaay_a_kawaw, title = simpi_kapah_katinengan_a_izaw_ku_mahicaay_a_kawaw, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/simpi_kapah_katinengan_a_izaw_ku_mahicaay_a_kawaw} }

S.FORM: simpi kapah katinengan a izaw ku mahicaay a kawaw.patatenga'ku tademaw tu simpi,anu ayaw a malitemuh ku canan a mahica i simpi a matineng,anu tasepian ku canan tungusay u paluayaway tu mamalitemuh a kawaw,u simpi ku sakatineng a hicaen atu amahica sa. tinaku tasepian katuud ku tademaw i lalabu nu luma',hakay u paluayaway tu a izaw ku mapatayay i lalabu nu luma'; tasepian yadah ku nitalingan a kasuy,atu pabelian nu tau tu tuud,hakay a makaala tu sayking caay sa uaa yadah ku nilangec,anu malupisak mawaswas ku kasuy,ainayay ku kalisiw atu kakasa'timan a tuud.

simpi kapah katinengan a izaw ko mahicaay a kawaw.patatenga'ko tademaw to simpi,ano ayaw a malitemoh ko canan a mahica i simpi a matineng,ano tasepian ko canan tongosay o paloayaway to mamalitemoh a kawaw,o simpi ko sakatineng a hicaen ato amahica sa. tinako tasepian katood ko tademaw i lalabo no loma',hakay o paloayaway to a izaw ko mapatayay i lalabo no loma'; tasepian yadah ko nitalingan a kasoy,ato pabelian no tao to tood,hakay a makaala to sayking caay sa oaa yadah ko nilangec,ano malopisak mawaswas ko kasoy,ainayay ko kalisiw ato kakasa'timan a tood.
